trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"></xref> event and for the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"></xref>事件以及<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: By default: - In the session authentication module (SAM) the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated> event is raised from within the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method after a session token (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) has been created.
trans-unit.target: 預設:-在工作階段驗證模組 (SAM)<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>內引發事件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法之後的工作階段語彙基元 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) 已建立。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>

trans-unit.source: This happens, for example, if an event handler for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived> event modifies the token.
trans-unit.target: 發生這種情況，例如，如果事件處理常式<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>事件修改語彙基元。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>

trans-unit.source: You can use the SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs to modify the session token before it is passed further along the pipeline and is used to authenticate the entity making the request (user).
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs 修改的工作階段權杖，然後再進一步沿著管線傳遞和用來驗證要求 （使用者） 的實體。

trans-unit.source: - In the WS-Federation authentication module (WSFAM), the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated> event is raised from the request processing pipeline just after a session token has been created from the WS-Federation sign-in response message received from the STS and just before the SAM is called to set the thread principal and write the session cookie.
trans-unit.target: -在 WS-同盟驗證模組 (WSFAM)，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>從之後已收到從 STS 和 SAM 呼叫以設定執行緒主體以及撰寫工作階段 cookie 之前, 的 WS-同盟登入回應訊息建立工作階段權杖的要求處理管線就會引發事件。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A> property to modify or replace the token.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A>屬性來修改或取代的權杖。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A> to specify whether the session cookie should be written (or re-written).
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A>來指定是否工作階段 cookie，應該寫入 （或重寫）。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified session security token.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs"></xref>使用指定的工作階段安全性權杖的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A> property is set to the token specified by the `sessionToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A>屬性設定為所指定的語彙基元`sessionToken`參數。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The session security token that was created.
trans-unit.target: 建立工作階段安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the session security token that was created.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所建立的工作階段安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The session token that was created.
trans-unit.target: 已建立的工作階段權杖。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a cookie should be written in the response.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該將 cookie 寫入回應中。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to write a cookie in the response; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要寫入回應; 中的 cookie否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the cookie is not written in the response.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，回應中不會寫入 cookie。
